entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kootenay (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 09:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: WSW 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
